backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains two feature evidence reports referencing HeroSection and GallerySection modifications.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries for all frontend source files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH CSS variables and dark mode mappings.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO meta tags, OG/Twitter data, favicon, fonts, and JSON‑LD for LocalBusiness.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes all page sections with header, footer, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing brand info, contact links, quick links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with scroll styling, navigation, mobile menu, and call CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an animated About section with company background text and a highlights grid using scroll reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a contact form that opens WhatsApp with prefilled info and displays contact details with scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays a scroll-animated FAQ accordion with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Shows a scroll-animated gallery of sample and uploaded images with lazy loading and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Renders the landing hero with background image, logo, headings, and CTA buttons including phone, WhatsApp, and smooth scroll.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Displays a grid of service cards with icons, titles, and descriptions using scroll reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Renders a testimonials section with scroll-reveal animation, displaying three client reviews in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Displays six reasons to choose the service, each with an icon and scroll-reveal animation in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/StickyWhatsAppBu: Floating WhatsApp button with pulse animation and hover tooltip linking to wa.me.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to reveal elements on scroll unless reduced-motion is enabled.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom black‑and‑gold theme variables, typography, utilities, and reduced‑motion rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, architectural notes, and build planning state for the website.
